inn1.comm: Full pitched outside off stump and Ryder crashes it through the off side.
drifts down the leg side for a wide
Ah! the inside edge. You gotta love them. It was good length delivery that cut back into the left-hander and Ryder stabbed it off the inner edge to the fine-leg boundary
leans forward and covers the line of a similar delivery this time and defends to the off side
beaten by a lovely off cutter
angling away from Ryder who lets it go through to Dhoni
down the leg side for yet another wide.
And deja-vu there
gets the line right and beats Ryder with a short-of-length delivery cutting away
ovely shape away from Ryder, gets him to play before moving past the outside edge
leans forward to defend to the off side
lovely swinging delivery, leaving Ryder late and beating him comprehensively. The conditions are perfect for bowling right now .
leans forward to defend and the away movement means it runs off the outer edge to backward point
length delivery angling across McCullum who opens the blade to push it to cover point
holding its line and it rolls away off the pads
gets forward to defend to covers
135 kmph delivery jagging back into the left-hander and raps him on the thigh pad
And again. 140 kmph this time, cutting into Ryder with bounce and moves past the forward prod to crash into the thigh. India have started well.
fuller and outside off and Ryder flashes it away to third man region. He intended to get it past cover point but the slight movement meant the ball ran away towards third man
133 kmph length delivery that beats Ryder again. PK has been at the top of his game here.
132 kmph delivery on the middle stump, straightening a touch and Ryder nudges it to the off side
lands short in length on the middle and leg line and Ryder wrists it past square leg for a single
fullish and this time its another outswinger - he was taking it away from the left-handers as well - squeezed to backward point
short of length delivery around the off stump and McCullum gets behind the line to push it to the off side
lovely inswing into Brendon who shapes to drive to the off side and the ball squirts away to third man. This is high-quality bowling from Praveen Kumar, who is getting the ball to move both ways.
slips down the leg side as Zak tries to curve the ball back into the right hander
gets it right this time and beats the bat straight away. Mccullum has a cautious flirt at a delivery that left him late.
shorter in length, moving towards middle and off and McCullum hops back to deflect it to the on side.
lands around the off stump and moves away, left alone.
In the channel outside off stump and McCullum covers his off stump before shouldering arms. New Zealand will do well not to lose a wicket in this opening spell

ooh lovely delivery that moved away from the middle stump and even better batting from McCullum. He read the ball well, shuffled across to cover the off stump and shouldered arms. Good cricket all round.
lands around the off stump before darting away sharply, left alone
leans across to push a delivery leaving him to point region

beaten by a gem. It was a tad fuller around the middle and off and darted away late. Ryder tried to cover the swing and got the bat outside the line and the ball rushed between the bat and pad and jsut past the off stump
slightly short and Ryder seizes the opportunity to short-arm pull it to long-leg but can't beat Zak at the boundary line
fullish, straighter around the off stump, McCullum dead bats it to the off side and they rush across for a quick single
from round the stumps this time, getting the ball to curve back in and Ryder opens the bat face to steer it to point region.
length delivery on the middle stump and McCullum leans forward to push it to wards mid-off for a single
beaten again. This one landed full around the off stump, luring Ryder forward before leaving him late.
this one comes back in and Ryder pushes it down the track where Zak fails to stop it  and they get a run

aha! there is the charge by McCullum but he couldn't connect. He moved outside leg in the process and Zaheer dragged back the length. McCullum tried to clout it over the off-side field but the ball bounced over the flashing blade
on the middle stump, from a length, worked to midwicket
moving across Brendon who is squared up a touch but adjusts to deflect the ball to point
Short and outside off and Ryder crashes it beautifully through the off side. Whack!
fuller, moving away from Ryder who lets Dhoni collect that

Ryder has started to flow and it's great to watch. Full length delivery but width outside off and Ryder creams it through covers. No need to run. He just stands there and watches the ball thud into the advertising hoardings.
better length and cutting away, squeezed to third man region
full and straight, trying to trap him in front, McCullum shapes to off drive and edges it to midwicket
on a length, around the off stump, pushed to covers
cutting in towards off and middle, no room to work with and Ryder turns it to the on side
gets forward to defend to the off side. Again Zaheer making sure he doesn't give any room
stands tall to punch the length delivery past backward point and to the wide third man
nagging line and length continues. So does the movement from this pitch. This one cuts away from McCullum who carefully pushes it to the off side
There he goes down dancing. He again moves outside leg as he runs down the wicket and plays a feisty cut shot for a boundary.
tries to give himself room by moving towards leg stump but still can't create much room and nudges it to point
gets forward to defend a length delivery on the off and middle line. One slip and a very short square point in place
fuller and eased to mid-on
The off-side is packed but try telling that to Ryder. He gets on the front foot, opens the bat face late and square drives past the diving short cover point and to the right of covers
PK tries to surprise him with a bouncer but Ryder adjusts to pull it over midwicket. He didn't quite connect well as he was a touch late in picking the length but will pick up two runs
length delivery this time and is defended to the off side
a tad slower and fuller but Ryder adjusts superbly to lunge forward to on drive it past the bowler and to the right of mid-on. The outfield is super fast and the ball races away
bangs it short of length and gets it to hold its line on the middle stump, McCullum is cramped for room, tries to guide to third man but is beaten
Whoa! six over third man! McCullum charges out and Ishant tries to follow him. McCullum goes for the big lofted shot over covers and get a nice thick fat edge.
Fab upper cut. Short delivery on the off and middle, not much room but McCullum arches back to carve it over backward point.
hits the deck short of length around the off stump, steered to left of backward point. Free hit coming up folks and Ryder on strike. Much fun.
he misses out there. It was a full pitched delivery outside off, begging to be sent to the crowd but Ryder mistimed his drive and the ball went to mid-off
deflects this length delivery to third man for a single
short in length, cutting towards hips, tucked past square leg
short of length delivery outside off, punched to covers
short of length, holding its line outside off stump, jabbed to the on side
Slam! Short in length and McCullum is quick to rock back to pull it to the boundary
drifting to the hips from short of length and McCullum glances it and again finds the boundary
Three in a row and McCullum is rocking here at Hamilton. Fab to watch. This was a fuller delivery and McCullum thrashes it through the off side
short in length and on the middle, McCullum hops across and deflects it to the on side
on the middle and leg, turned to fine leg for a single
short in length and outside off, Ryder cuts it hard but Sehwag makes a diving half stop to his left at point.
hits the deck short of length around the middle stump, defended back down the pitch
straightens around the off and middle line, guided to point
on a length, around the off stump, tapped towards covers for a single
outside off, short in length, punched to deep point
chance for a run out. Turned past square leg and they come back for the second run. Yusuf Pathan, our dear Brother Yo, hurled in a good throw but couldn't find the direct hit.
leans forward to drive to the off side
Short in length and Ryder pulls but straight to long leg
fullpitched, timed sweetly to mid-off but they still go for the run and make it in time to beat PK's throw
leans forward to defend a full length delivery to the off side
cutting into Brendon who turns it to the on side.
cutting into the hips, tucked to the on side
bowl slow, bowl fast but it's disappearing son, says McCullum. It was a slower one and McCullum moved outside leg and a had a big ol' slog. The ball flew off the outer edge and to third man boundary.

Another slower one and McCullum is early into the lofted shot but goes through with the shot and Harbhajan heads back towards covers, takes the 'catch' and flings it back before stepping over the ropes.
sharp incutter, McCullum is surprised by the amount of the movement, has a waft , misses and is hit high on the pad
good delivery this. It held its line after landing short of length around the middle and off, McCullum stays adjacent to the line, trying to dab it to the off side but is beaten
on the hips, clipped away past square leg for a single
on the leg stump line, tapped to the midwicket region for a single
quicker delivery, slanted across Ryder who goes for a drive and is beaten
gets forward to punch the ball down to long-off for a single
leans forward to defend
floated on the off stump line, pushed to covers
Stumping chance missed! McCullum had charged out but was beaten in the flight and the dip that Yuvraj got and he looked a dead duck. But Dhoni didn't collect the ball cleanly. What a miss.
from round the stumps, pushed through flat, worked behind square leg
flat and quick, on the off stump, backs away to cut but can't beat Gautam at backward point
leans forward to defend a delivery on the middle
fires it flat and fast and on the middle stump line, pushed to the off side
another quick delivery, McCullum stabs it off the inner edge to his pad
pushes this one to wide mid-off region for a single.
leans forward to push through covers
Floated on the off stump line and Ryder picks it up cleanly to deposit it to midwicket boundary
turns the strike over with a nurdle to square leg
punches on the up and the ball goes in the air but safe and he will get a single down to long-off
short delivery on the pads, turned to long leg
slightly short in length, cut past point
leans forward to defend to the leg side
from round the stumps, fires in a quick one, Ryder tries to paddle sweep it but can't connect properly
on the middle and leg, worked through to deep midwicket region for a single
Yusuf fires in another one - he has been really sending them flat and fast today - and McCullum pushes on the up and the ball almost carries to Yusuf who dives forward
slightly slower, on the middle, defended on the front foot
the tight line continues- on the middle and off again - pushed to covers
Oh no our favourite boy is gone. Ryder went for the slog sweep, top edged it  over square leg and Raina back pedals to take a tumbling catch. Entertaining innings comes to an end.
driven to long-on for a single
floated in towards middle and off, defended to the on side
lands outside off and stays there, left alone by Ross Taylor
slightly short in length, cut to short third man
leans forward to ease through covers for a single
leans forward to work the ball to midwicket
turns in to beat the prod and runs off the pad to short fine leg
leans forward to drive to long-on for a single
leans forward to push to covers
leans forward to defend
on the off and middle line, driven with the spin to covers
on the middle stump line, dabbed to midwicket region
leans forward to push to cover point to bring up his fifty. Fine innings. The ball was moving around early; he countered that before unfurling a few big shots
comes forward to ping long-off
flighted on the off and middle line, pushed back to Yuvraj
flatter and quicker on the middle stump line, pushed down to long-on
comes down the track, Yusuf drags in short and it runs off the pad to short fine leg
Shot. It was fired in at the off stump but McCullum used the short of length to back away and carve it over backward point
cut away again but this time to deep point
What a gift. Ross Taylor what have you done here? It was short and on the leg side, waiting to be dispatched to the crowd but he mistimes his pull and finds deep backward square leg.
slower through the air, on the leg stump line, nurdled past square leg
stays back to punch to covers
full and on the off and middle, steered to cover point for a single
leans forward to drive to Raina at cover
comes in with the arm, towards off stumps, sliced to point
that was a quick delivery, cut away to sweeper
fuller, slower, guided to backward point. Nice little over, with lots of variations in pace
leans well forward to defend to the on side
full, straight, on the middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
leans forward to push to covers
full and flat, punched down to long-off for a single
beaten by the delivery that straightens after landing on a length outside off stump ..
slower, turning in on the middle stump, deflected to short fine-leg region
on the off stump line, pushed to covers
slower, outside off, cut away to deep cover
fuller , Brendon shapes to sweep I think but adjusts on seeing the length to defend
moves outside leg but cant find room as Yuvraj directs it on the middle and the ball is pushed to point
on the middle, worked through midwicket
Brendon rocks on. Down on his knee and a big slog sweep. THe white ball flies into the stands. Immense fun.
pushed in quicker on middle and off, went on straight, pushed back to him
tossed up on middle, defended solidly back to the bowler, landed on a good length but he covered it nicely
full on the off stump, gave it a lot of air, pushes it back to Harbhajan
quicker and flat outside off, opens the face to guide it to deep point
short of a length on middle and leg, defended back to the bowler, tidy stuff
tossed up on the off stump, tries to defend towards cover, ends up getting a thick inside edge towards midwicket, end of an excellent over
flat on middle, no spin whatsoever, reaches forward to defend
short of a length on the off stump, turned away off the back foot to midwicket
New Zealand will be frustrated by this, bowled short and wide, tries to cut, misses
similar delivery but he's unable to pierce the field, chops it down to point
fuller outside off, slices it away wide of deep point for a well-run couple, that will relieve him a little
full on middle, lunges forward to defend
short of a length outside off, waits for it to spin into him and slashes it powerfully to deep cover, hit fiercely but only gets a single
flighted outside off, driven off the front foot between long-off and deep cover for a couple
slightly short on the off stump, defended back onto the pitch
flighted on middle and leg, drives it past the bowler but midwicket dives to his left to prevent a single
fullish on middle, takes a couple of steps forward and drives it down the ground to long-off
fraction short outside off, makes room and cuts it away to deep cover
short outside off, struck well but straight to short cover

dropped, Sehwag the culprit! Short, rank long hop on middle, McCullum pulls it away, strikes it well but straight o deep midwicket who is positioned perfectly but spills it while trying to dive forward, how costly is that going to be?
on middle and off, defended on the off side on the front foot
full on middle and off, driven straight to cover
flatter on middle, pushed into the leg side off the front foot
pushed off the back foot to long-on
tossed up on leg stump, driven down the ground to long-on
full outside off, drives it firmly but is again unable to beat the fielder at cover
short of a length outside off, cuts it away off the back foot to deep point
pushed through quicker on middle, driven back to the bowler
gave it some air this time, comes down the track and drills it back to Harbhajan, struggling to find singles despite a spread-out field
full on middle and leg, pushed straight to midwicket
short of a length outside off, punched off the back foot to deep cover

appeal for run out, he's comfortably in, cut away wide of deep point where Praveen Kumar picks it up cleanly running to his left and scores a direct hit at the striker's end while the batsmen are attempting a second, but Guptill is a tall man and has a pretty good reach
punched off the back foot towards long-on
short of a length on the off stump, quicker, tries to dab it into the off side, takes the inside edge and rolls wide of square leg
pushed off the back foot into the off side for a single
goes for it, mistimes it completely but gets away, flighted on middle and tries to smash that over the bowlers head, ends up slicing it and the ball lands well short of long-on
tries to push it back past Harbhajan who dives full length to his left to save a single, excellent commitment
flighted on middle, lands short of a good length, punched back to the bowler
comes down the track and drives it wide of long-off for a couple this time
tossed up outside off, lands short, struck to deep cover
full on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
fullish on middle, pushed back uppishly, but it lands well short of the bowler, the spinners doing an excellent job here
fires in a yorker, dug out towards covers and they rush across for a quick single. The throw misses the stumps at the non-striker's end and they cross over again for the second run
length delivery, worked to backward point
shuffles towards off, Zak follows him and Mac drives to covers

loud loud shout from Zaheer and after a while, the umpire agrees with him. It was a yorker on the leg stump, McCullum shuffles, tries to work it to the on side and is struck on the boot. Zaheer appealed. Umpire unmoved. Zaheer appeals again. Still no luck. He screams out, How zaattttttt again. FInally the finger goes up. That was out. Replays confirm that.
low full toss as he attempts another yorker, 143 kmph, pushed to the off side
short in length, outside off stump, dabbed to backward point

Oh boy another one down. New Zealand are wobbling here at Hamilton. Ishant got this one to burst off short of length and cramped Oram who was trying to back away to create room; he stabbed it in the end and the ball flew off the glove straight into Dhoni's gloves.
another edge but doesn't carry to Dhoni. Another lifter from short of length, jabbed off the outside edge and Dhoni dived to his right but couldn't reach. It fell short and ran past the first slip
worked to wide midwicket region
cutting in to the middle stump line, wristed through the on side
in the zone outside off stump and the batsman pushes inside the line and is beaten
on a length, around off stump, nudged to cover point for a single
almost holed up to deep midwicket. It was short in length and he went for the pull but didn't connect well.
leans forward to push a really full delivery to the off side
shorter in length, nurdled to the on side and Zaheer rushes after it.

goes for the yorker, ends up as a low full toss, steered to backward point where Harbhajan Singh makes a mess as he slips and the ball rushes past him. 
he puts his hand up to apologize to Zak.
on the pads, rolls away for a leg bye
short in length, moves away to the leg side, can't find the timing on the flashy on-the-up drive and the ball rolls towards covers and off they run for the single
short in length, goes for the big pull but it runs off the toe end of the bat to third man.
lovely! He bent his back knee, got into a nice position to paddle a short-of-length delivery from outside off to deep backward square leg boundary. Paddling away a fast bowler.
as expected this is a lifter, dabbed to the off side
fuller, on the middle, straightening, pushed back to the bowler

Guptil's struggles end. Short and outside off, he top edged the cut shot to third man where D Karthik, the sub, catches. He almost spills it but manages to hold on inches off the ground. Will catch a replay and see how close the ball was to the ground.
rising delivery from short of length, curdled to backward square leg for two runs. What is curdle? I don't know. It's a sort of a mix between tickle and nurdle
shuffles to the off stump and works a full delivery to midwicket for a single
McGlashan continues to be unorthodox. It was a full toss and he paddled it from the off stump to the boundary.
short in length, outside off, punched to backward point

from round the stumps, short in length, punched uppishly to right of covers where Rohit dives but can't reach the ball but deflects it towards Raina who rushes in from extra cover and fires in a throw at the non-striker's end but missed. Had he hit, he would have got the man.
short in length, guided wide of third man for couple of runs
slips in a slower one and that one literally slips as well and ends up as  a full toss but the surprised batsman can only tap it gently
oh dear .. it landed around leg and middle and turned away down leg. Dhoni can't get across in time and misses it completely. "It's not good wicketkeeping," coos Ian Smith on air.
turned behind square leg
turns in from off stump, worked to midwicket
spins in from outside off, pushed to cover point for a single
bit more air, a tad slower, defended to the off side
full and on the middle, flicked towards midwicket
from over the stumps, coming into the body and raps him high on the thigh
short in length, outside off, pushed to covers
short in length again, just outside off, turdled towards third man
spits up from short of length, catching the batsman by surprise but he adjusts to stab it down
comes down the track, Ishant slips in a slower one and that has been nurdled to square leg for a single
full and just outside off stump, driven well but straight to mid-off
spins in towards middle and leg, turned past square leg
on the middle and leg, goes for the reverse paddle, top edges it over Dhoni who tries to grab it but can't reach
Forget reverse paddle, go for the hard reverse sweep Mate, says McGlashan. He swept it hard and past backward point
turning in towards middle stump, patted gently to the off side
flighted full outside off, driven to long-off
on the off stump line, slower through the air this time, dabbed to left of short third man
The bouncer arrives and he shapes to pull but withdraws from the shot
Superb shot. He took couple of steps down the track and knifed through the line, up and over mid-off, couple of bounces and over the ropes
overpitched outside off, sliced to deep point
banged in short on the middle, worked behind square leg for a single
fullish on the off stump, shuffles across to drive towards mid-on for a single
short and climbing, pushed close to the off side for a quick single
flighted delivery, slow in the air, on the off stump line, defended on the front foot
flighted full on the middle and leg, wristed away for a single
full again, square driven to cover point
shorter, flatter, on the middle, backed away to the leg side but all he can do is to push it to covers
reverse sweeps the flighted doosra to sweeper cover region where Gautam makes a sliding stop
moves outside leg stump and Harbhajan fires it on the pads, rolls away to short fine leg
switches to round the stumps and flights on the leg stump line, swept to right of Zaheer at long leg for couple of runs
short in length and outside off, cut away past point
charges out and Ishant fires it short but pushes it wide outside off stump, the batsman misses and Dhoni underarms a throw at the striker's end but he is in
He took a step down and attempted to reverse sweep with the wrong side of the bat but doesn't connect
ha! what does he do in the first ball post resumption? Attempt a reverse paddle, misses but it runs off the pad through vacant slip region and to the boundary. He was struck just outside off
fires in a yorker, takes the left leg out, pushed to the on side
outside off stump, cut away for a single
banged in short from round the stumps, McGlashan clears the front foot and tries to pull but can't find much power
six over backward point! Wow. McGlashan backed away and PK fired it short but the batsman adjusted well to upper cut it up and over the boundary
moves away again and this time Praveen follows him, dragged to long leg for a single
bowls a slower one but slips just down leg, Elliot shuffles across and tries to paddle it away but can't connect
fires in a yorker, edged to the on side
More of the paddle sweeps. McGlashan doesn't have a orthodox bone in his body.  He stepped down the track, PK kept it really full and he paddled it away fine. Immense fun.
pulls away to deep midwicket region
just short of the blockhole, driven down the ground for a single
driven through the off side

DRopped by Gautam at deep midwicket. And that brings up McGlashan's fifty. Innovations galore. He stepped down and pulled it high in the air, Gautam charged in and swooped down, got both hands to it, but clanged it
slower one, full and outside off, early into the shot and ends up dragging it to Harbhajan at square leg
another full delivery outside off, McGlashan turns around to play a reverse sweep but misses it completely
what a shot. He walked down the track and swept it to the deep square leg boundary. Yeah, swept the seamer away.
full and outside off, pushed to the off side
The white ball is flying everywhere at Hamilton. Harbhajan dragged it short and Elliot pulls it high and over deep midwicket
rotates the strike with a drive down the ground
another reverse sweep but just a single this time
The sweeps keep coming. The conventional one this time. It was a full toss on the middle and leg and he put it away for another boundary
Four more! He went down on his knee and slog swept a flighted delivery to yet another boundary. Great cracking finish by the Black Caps. 270 for 5.

inn2.comm: Length delivery on the pads, rolls away to the on side for a leg bye. India need 280 runs more.
leg cutter around the off stump line, guided to point region
short of length, cutting away from the middle stump, Sehwag pushes it wide of mid-on for a single
easy on the eye. Full length delivery outside off and Gambhir walks down the wicket, leans across to caress it through covers
in the corridor outside off stump, left alone
angling across Gautam who shoulders arms
114 kmph length delivery, gentle start, on the middle and leg, turned to the on side for a single
112 kmph so gentle that the ball bounces twice before it reaches the keeper. Martin Crowe says, "No pace for the opening batsmen."
slow again, Gambhir lunges forward, is too early into the shot and checks his drive
walks down the wicket to turdle a 114kmph length delivery behind square leg
slightly short in length and Sehwag plonks his front foot out and crashes it over short midwicket.
128 kmph - he is really cranking up the pace here! - gentle swing in to Sehwag who defends on the front foot
134 kmph short in length and another leg bye as the ball rolls of the thigh pad to short fine leg
short in length, swatted towards wide mid-on and Sehwag says, "aa ja" [come] and they cross over
tip and run. Pushed close on the off side and they scamper across
almost caught and bowled. Sehwag was early into the drive, couldn't keep the ball down and Mills lunged to his left  and got his finger tips on the ball but ..
short in length and outside off, dabbed down to third man
length delivery that keeps a tad low, not much but just lower than what Sehwag anticipated, he has a waft but misses
short in length, cutter coming into Gambhir who turns the strike over with a neat little dab to the leg side
This was almost expected. Full delivery and Sehwag kills it over deep midwicket. Furious frivolity indeed. What next.
Slips down leg side and Sehwag flicks it away calmly and gets it to the boundary. Much foolery, as a reader SI suggested.
wide down the leg side now. Where will he bowl? What will Sehwag do?
gets the ball to curve back in towards off and middle, defended on the front foot
ooh .. goes for the big lofted shot but the bat handle rotates in his hands and the ball rolls towards long-on
short in length, Gambhir wrists it to deep backward square leg region for couple of runs
Sehwag show is on. Lovely clean swing of the bat - that bat speed is amazing - and he crashes a fullish delivery through the off side
short in length, close to the off stump, cramping up Sehwag who wants to cut but doesnt' find the room and the ball clips the pad flap and goes through to keeper
length delivery, mistimes the drive but will pick up the single as the ball rolls to the on side
beaten outside off stump. It bounced from short of length, cutting away from a surprised Gautam who hung his bat out. Lovely delivery.
a tad fuller, tapped gently towards right of backward point and they pick up the single
full delivery, cutting away from Sehwag who wants to drive to the on side but gets a leading edge towards left of mid-off
short in length outside off, cut to point
he was eying the big hit over the on side but killed the thought after seeing the ball land on a good length and pushes it to the off side
nice. another length delivery and Sehwag ends up mistiming another big drive to short cover. Sehwag is really itching to go after this bowler
another length delivery, coming in, worked through midwicket..
The keeper stands up to the stumps when Gautam bats. This one has been nudged to third man for a single
Boom. This was another length delivery but little bit of width on offer and Sehwag goes up and over extra cover. Hit on the up.
leans forward to defend a good-length delivery down the pitch
good delivery, coming into the rib cage, tucked behind square for a single
cutting in towards middle stump, Sehwag pushes back, turns it to right of midwicket and they hurry across for a run

tries to defend to the off side and run but Mills rushes across to deny him. Mills suggests that Gambhir should try hitting instead of these tip and run. Gambhir has a few words to say as well. Bloody entertaining
sticks to dabbing and picks up a run to the off side
peachy delivery, cutting away late to beat Sehwag comprehensively.
full pitched outside off stump, driven to right of covers where Guptill makes a diving half-stop
The blogger has been blogrolled. O'Brien pitches it short and Sehwag pulls it over midwicket. He just stands there and watches the ball fly.
Oh dear oh dear . Sehwag almost decapitated O'Brien here. It was a full length delivery, he thrashed it on the up and the ball flew past the startled bowler
comes back with a yorker, dug out to the off side.
overpitched on the legs - he would know that's rubbish - and Sehwag whips it to the boundary.
Oh my... Sehwag is gone bonkers. It was short-pitched delivery and Sehwag cleared the front foot and clouted it over mid-on and to the long-on boundary
short in length and outside off, Gautam punches it past point for couple of runs.
tapped close on the off side, GAmbhir looks across, Sehwag calls him for a run and they scamper across very quickly
full and curving away from Sehwag who guides to point
full pitched, Sehwag's big bat comes crashing down but he doesn't connect well and drags it through midwicket

short of length leg cutter outside off but Sehwag just wrists it away to the on side for a run. Fifty up! The noisy large crowd lap it up. Shaun screams in my inbox "Well... this is turning into a right rollicking romp of rambunctiousness!"
If Sehwag won't Gautam will get ya..  Full and outside off, he leans across to play a delicious cover drive
Quantum of solace for O'Brien as the ball thuds into the pad and Sehwag gets across for a leg bye
full in length, around the off stump, defended to the off side and another quick run is taken. And they collect an overthrow as well.

Dropped by  Ross Taylor   Gambhir charged down the track and smashed a length delivery to covers. It was traveling at some speed where Ross Taylor jumped, stretching out his right hand out but ended up palming it over.
on the middle and leg, worked behind square leg
banged in short of length and Sehwag gets his front leg up in the air and swats it to midwicket
140 kmph bouncer and Gambhir takes the bottom-hand off the handle but still manages to place the ball close on the leg side, towards square leg, for a single
beats him with a arm ball outside off stump ...
pushed through the on side for a single
driven through the off sdie for a single
drags it short and Gambhir dismisses it with a pull shot. A very rare short delivery from V. Must be the rain.
outside the off stump, left alone
slightly short, Gambhir shapes to cut but the ball curves away and Gambhir can't connect
O'Brien bowls the bouncer, Sehwag goes for the pull and top edges it over the keeper's head
Drum rolls ..... six over deep midwicket. Thwack. Boom. Biff. It was short in length and Sehwag clouted it into the crowd.
turned to the on side for a single
short in length, angling away, turned to backward point
short in length outside off stump, guided to third man
whoopee ... almost a six or bowled. He gave it everything, Sehwag ie, but missed the ball and it shaved past the off stump.
just outside the off stump, late cut to short third man where O'Brien can't stop it despite a tumbling dive
turns in from outside off, Gambhir jabs it to the on side.
another short delivery from Vettori - he doesn't gift boundaries like this; usually bowls full - and Gambhir cuts it away with ease
turning in from a full length, worked to the on side
flighted outside off, full and Gambhir lunges across to square drive it to right of point
slower in the air, turns from the leg and middle line, dabbed to the on side for a single
There he goes again. Full pitched delivery and Sehwag drags it past the short fine-leg fielder
It's a slower one, he goes over extra cover, more elevation than distance but still picks up a few runs
The dibbly-dobbly bowling is back and sehwag is loving it. This one disappears to square leg boundary. The front foot comes out, the bat comes down and the ball whizzes over square leg
if you want to avoid getting  hit bowl a wide. Or so Thompson thinks. The umpire extends his arms.
Very full, very wide and Sehwag reaches out to slice it to deep backward point boundary
he was lining up there but Thompson pushed it to the leg stump line and Sehwag tries to work it to the on side but it rolls away off the pad
stop the press. It's a dot ball. Gambhir leans forward to defend. Perfect copy book defense too..
flighted full, drilled hard but straight to mid-on standing at the edge of the circle
threatens to come down and Vettori quickly pushes it across flatter and shorter in length, pushed back down the track
full and on the stumps, Sehwag stays adjacent to drive inside-out but straight to covers.
leans forward to pick up a single with a push towards mid-off
goes back, waits for the turn to deflect to the on side
With the mid-on in, Sehwag flays the flighted delivery over the fielder. The runs are flooding in thick and fast. What a night. He has already hit his 100th ODI six earlier in the game.
leans forward to push for a quick single
drifts to the legs, clipped away to deep square leg for 2 runs
What the ...  Sehwag picks the full delivery from middle and leg and deposits it over deep midwicket boundary.
rotates the strike with a push to cover point
short in length, angling across, defended to the off side
length delivery cutting across Gambhir who tries to square drive but can't connect
oh ho, leans forward to play a lovely defensive stroke. He is playing with the mind here. There is a term for it, I can't use it on this family site.
drives down the ground for a single
lovely stuff from Vettori,. He slowed this delivery, flighted it outside off, dragging GAmbhir across and beats the batsman on the drive
gets forward to push it to long-on for a single
charges down the track, Vettori keeps his head and sends down a slow loopy delivery and sehwag drives to left of long-on
flatter, quicker, pushed back to the bowler. Superb over this. Nice little variations.
full pitched and Sehwag drives straight. Too straight as it crashes against the stumps at the other end and deflects to long-on
short in length, tucked past square leg
Oram keeps it full, Sehwag keeps it simple; clears the front foot and swings to deep midwicket
short in length but drifts towards pads and Gambhir glances it to fine-leg boundary to bring up India's 150.
on the off stump, tickled to backward point
leans forward to defend
flighted to the pads, Sehwag shapes to flick and it runs away off the pad to the boundary.
threatens to come down, Vettori loops it on the middle, Sehwag lunges out to squeeze it to square leg
flighted outside off, Gambhir brings up his fifty with a wristy flick to midwicket.

Catch catch was Vettori's cry of plea but that has been sucked over long-off boundary by the fans. He waltzed down the track and got under the ball. Initially, one thought he got more elevation than distance  but it kept going. 100 up for Virender Sehwag. 7th fastest in the ODI history.
down the track again and drives through midwicket for a single
leans forward to defend to the off side
Kill Bill 2 on now. Sehwag has flayed that. Really killed that. He whacked the full delivery over Gambhir's head
yorker length and squeezed to backward point
dropped by McGlashan. It was short in length, outside off, Sehwag shaped to late cut  and McGlashan, standing up to the stumps, couldn't hold on. Very very tough chance
waits for the ball to arrive before running it past backward point
yorker on the middle, ends up a low dipping full toss, driven to long-on
on the off and middle, guided to backward point
slower one, full and on the middle, Sehwag adjusts, taps it to the off side for a single
short in length, cut away to deep point
banged in short and Sehwag ducks
slower one, short in length this time and it runs off the pad to short fine-leg region as Sehwag missed connecting with his glance shot
high bouncer at Gambhir and it has been called a wide . Harsh call.. not too high I thought ..
turned to the on side
leans forward to drive to long-off for a single
another slower one, Gambhir ends up dragging the ball past midwicket
fullish, outside off, driven sweetly to deep cover
places the left leg outside leg stump and drives the full-pitched delivery to long-on
on the off stump line, dabbed to backward point
slightly short in length and short-arm jabbed to deep square leg
The first six after resumption in play. Sehwag has lofted a full delivery over long-off. What can you say but 'furious frivolity returns'
leans forward to push a length delivery to point
Don't imagine that Gautam will just keep rotating the strike. This was a full delivery and he swung it over wide mid-on region
leans forward to defend to point
it was a short of length delivery on the middle and Gambhir opens the bat face and plays a deft late cut to third man
length delivery outside off, mistimes a drive to covers
overpitched delivery and creamed but straight to covers. That was traveling, had it been a foot away from the fielder, it would have fled to the boundary
yorker around the leg stump line, off the pad to the leg side. Did he get an inside edge there?
The end is nigh. 200 of the partnership is up in style. It was a short delivery, Sehwag pulled it off the front foot and over deep midwicket and the ball sailed towards raucous fans
leans forward to push for a single
